resources.string: Wallpapers are stored on Cloud Server. Please connect to Internet and try again.
Download completed successfully Picture is located at
Nice choice their! Would like this wall cropped or set as is?
Some wallpapers provided by Drywall may or may not be suitable for your android device screen resolution. Consider cropping and scaling it properly before applying it.
Picture set as wallpaper successfully Go to Home screen and check it.
Looks like we ran into a problem…Excuse the dust.
Error while downloading wallpapers info. Try again later.

If Drywall contains media that you wish to be removed for legal reasons, Please contact the developer with reasonable reason to be removed and correctful action will be taken. All wallpapers provided by Drywall are free and can be freely managed through the cloud at any time.
It appears your device does not have an active internet connection it. This application is useless without it thus will now close.
Welcome to Drywall, a material 2 based wallpaper management tool thats smarter than most dashboards available. Enjoy and Thanks for using Drywall!
Would you like to download this wallpaper? You can find it in the Drywall directory of your internal memory.

Blurring your wallpaper will consume a considerable amount of ram and cpu usage thus this process may take longer on older devices, would you like to continue? Please wait patiently until process has finished!
Server list are still updating so, some of the wallpaper categories may not be up to par with their specific categories. Give it some time and we will have some fresh content live soon!
In order for Drywall to function correctly, it\'s going to need access to a few run-time permissions. Denying them access will prevent the application from running.
Like my work? Consider purchasing my donation key as a token of appreciation for Drywall development.
This is the featured window. In this tab, Drywall will randomly pick a category to showcase to the user as a preview.
View application info in the android settings
